Package com.intellij.openapi.ui

Interface InputValidator

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    InputValidatorEx
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractCreateFormAction.JavaNameValidator, CreateDirectoryOrPackageHandler, CreateElementActionBase.MyInputValidator, CreateFileAction.MyValidator, GitNewBranchNameValidator, GitRefNameValidator, HgBranchReferenceValidator, HgPatchReferenceValidator, HgReferenceValidator, IdentifierValidator, NameValidator, NonEmptyInputValidator, RenameProjectHandler.MyInputValidator

    public interface InputValidator
    The validator for input dialogs.
    See Also:
    Messages.showInputDialog(String, String, javax.swing.Icon, String, InputValidator), Messages.showInputDialog(java.awt.Component, String, String, javax.swing.Icon, String, InputValidator), Messages.showInputDialog(com.intellij.openapi.project.Project, String, String, javax.swing.Icon, String, InputValidator), Messages.showEditableChooseDialog(String, String, javax.swing.Icon, String[], String, InputValidator)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean canClose(java.lang.String inputString)
      This method is invoked just before message dialog is closed with OK code.
      boolean checkInput(java.lang.String inputString)
      Checks whether the inputString is valid.

    • Method Detail

      • checkInput

        boolean checkInput(java.lang.String inputString)
        Checks whether the inputString is valid. It is invoked each time input changes.
        Parameters:
        inputString - the input to check
        Returns:
        true if input string is valid

      • canClose

        boolean canClose(java.lang.String inputString)
        This method is invoked just before message dialog is closed with OK code. If false is returned then then the message dialog will not be closed.
        Parameters:
        inputString - the input to check
        Returns:
        true if the dialog could be closed, false otherwise.
